Entries.Rainy_Day_Shane: Hear the rain hitting the roof? It's nice, isn't it?$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_Shane: I just got off the phone with Marnie. Sounds like a bunch of her customers really want to buy my special blue chickens.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Shane: There's something special in the air... *sniff*... what is that? Oh...#$b#It's just this old corn chip that I put in my pocket a few weeks ago.#$e#How hard would you judge me if I told you that I'm really tempted to eat this?
Entries.Indoor_Night_Shane: How was your day? Mine actually went pretty well.$6
Entries.Outdoor_Shane: I have to take the time to think of the good things in my life every now and then. I like doing it here where I can see the whole farm and take it all in...$6#$e#Why don't you stay with me awhile, @?$6
Entries.spring_Shane: Maybe I should learn a new skill this year.#$b#Hmm... I can't decide what to study, though.$3
Entries.summer_Shane: Yoba, it's a scorcher today...$3#$b#Maybe I should grab a tub of ice cream from the stand in town.$6
Entries.fall_Shane: Ugh, how do mushrooms even grow this fast?$a#$b#Charlie almost ate a red one. It's a good thing I caught her in time.
Entries.winter_Shane: There's a wide, wide world out there...$3#$b#But I'm gonna stay here since we have heating.$6
Entries.spouseRoom_Shane: I feel like I should do something productive today, but I feel really awful...$s#$e#*sigh*... Maybe I'll just watch a movie or something.
